name: Block Collection for You – WP Block Pack
author: Falcon Theme

sections.description:
WP Block Pack is a pack of clean, useful and, customizable blocks for the WordPress block editor (Gutenberg). The blocks look great out of the box, and will make content writing a buzz. These blocks also responsive and will look great even in small screens.

We brings You these awesome blocks

In additon to your Block Editor, we packed these 11 powerful blocks. Of course we are not feeling enough with these blocks, we always developing new blocks, new features while maintaining the existing one.

  • Section
  • Drop Cap
  • Counter
  • Icon
  • Buttons Pro
  • Accordion
  • Tabs
  • Notice
  • Testimonial
  • Advertisement
  • Blockquote
sections.faq:
Why WordPress Block Editor?

The new content editor that came out in WordPress 5 gives you a more visual way of creating your content.

With it, you write post content and pages using blocks, and WP Block Pack plugin bring you a collection of cool blocks you gonna love.

What is block?

Block are the new shortcodes in WordPress 5.0.

These are elements that you add into your content to build your pages, like buttons, cards, videos, etc.

Can I use WP Block Pack with other block plugins?

Yes you can! WP Block Pack blocks could be use together with other blocks.

Can I use WP Block Pack on client websites?

Sure! You can use WP Block Pack on your client’s websites as well as yours.

Will WP Block Pack slow down my website?

Absolutely No! WP Block Pack is built with speed load in mind. Its designed and coded well to keep it lightweight and fast as possible.
sections.changelog:
1.1.6

  • New Editor compatibility.
  • FontAwesome offline removed replaced with CDN kit version
  • ‘Button Pro’ block and ‘Inline Buttons’ block combined into ‘Buttons Pro’ block
  • Style update

1.1.4

  • Add ‘Section’ Block.
  • WPBlockIcons update to 1.1.
  • New plugin files structure.

1.1.2

  • Update ‘Tabs’ Block, add more tab header styles.

1.1.0

  • Add ‘hide block from inserter’ feature.
  • Add ‘deactivate block’ feature.
  • Remove ‘Pro Button’ and ‘Just Icon’ blocks.

1.0.8

  • Add ‘Drop Cap’ Block.
  • ‘Blockquote’ Block enhanced.

1.0.6

  • Add ‘Inline Buttons’, ‘Icon’ and, ‘Counter’ Block.
  • ‘Just Icon’ Block now in deprecating list and will be removed in version 1.1.0.
  • Small Bug Fixed.

1.0.4

  • Add ‘Button Pro’ Block.
  • Update Icon inserter UI for ‘Just Icon’ Block.
  • ‘Pro Button’ Block now in deprecating list and will be removed in version 1.1.0.

1.0.2

  • Add ‘Tabs’ and ‘Accordion’ Blocks.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: A pack of clean, useful and, customizable blocks for the WordPress block editor (Gutenberg).
description:
WP Block Pack is a pack of clean, useful and, customizable blocks for the WordPress block editor (Gutenberg). The blocks look great out of the box, and will make content writing a buzz. These blocks also responsive and will look great even in small screens.

We brings You these awesome blocks

In additon to your Block Editor, we packed these 11 powerful blocks. Of course we are not feeling enough with these blocks, we always developing new blocks, new features while maintaining the existing one.

  • Section
  • Drop Cap
  • Counter
  • Icon
  • Buttons Pro
  • Accordion
  • Tabs

upgrade_notice.1.1.6: New editor Compatibility. 'Counter' Block update (add transparent background). 'Accordion' Block update (more color option). Bug fixes. 'Inline Buttons' and 'Button Pro' now combined into 'Buttons Pro' block. Remove offline FontAwesome (Now go with CDN Kit).
upgrade_notice.1.1.4: Adding new 'Section' Block. WPBlockIcons update to 1.1. New plugin files structure.
upgrade_notice.1.1.2: Update 'Tabs' Block, add more tab header styles. Update some dependencies (InnerBlocks, InspectorControls, RichText, etc) to meet latest Gutenberg function.
upgrade_notice.1.1.0: Adding more advanced settings area. Now you can hide block from inserter (without losing it's functionality). This feature very useful if you think it just too much block. You could also deactivate block you don't need to remove it completely from editor. And in this upgrade, 'Pro Button' and 'Just Icon' blocks now removed. If you not convert it yet, you should! Before upgrading. Or you will need to create a new one.
upgrade_notice.1.0.8: Adding New 'Drop Cap' Block. Updating Blockquote Block with 6 beautiful layouts. Some old blockquote block probably broken. You need create new one.
upgrade_notice.1.0.6: Adding Inline Buttons, Icon and, Counter Block. Some Bug Fixed. Reduce few files size.

screenshots.caption: Inline Buttons Block. (That's right! You can use other button from major other Block Collections.)
Counter Block. (The number will count up animated).
Button Pro Block. (Yes! You can use icon from Dashicon and Fontawesome. Both before and after the text.)
Tabs Block with Drop Cap block.
